00044 int CTextEntryDlg::Show(CWnd *pParent, LPCTSTR pszTitle, LPCTSTR pszPrompt, LPCTSTR pszDefault, bool bPassword)
00045 {
00046         // register window class:
00047         CString strClass = AfxRegisterWndClass(CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW, LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW), 
00048                                                                                                 CBrush(::GetSysColor(COLOR_BTNFACE)));
00049 
00050         if (!pParent)
00051                 pParent = AfxGetApp()->GetMainWnd();
00052         
00053     if (!CreateEx(WS_EX_DLGMODALFRAME, strClass, pszTitle, WS_SYSMENU | WS_POPUP | 
00054                                                 WS_BORDER | WS_CAPTION, 0,0, 348,100 + GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYCAPTION), 
00055                                                 pParent ? pParent->GetSafeHwnd() : NULL, NULL))
00056         {
00057                 return 0;
00058         }
00059 
00060         CenterWindow();
00061 
00062         if (!m_ctlLabel.Create(pszPrompt, WS_VISIBLE | WS_CHILD | SS_NOPREFIX | SS_LEFT, 
00063                         CRect(6,6,340,35), this))
00064         {
00065                 return 0;
00066         }
00067         
00068         if (!m_ctlOK.Create(_T("OK"), WS_CHILD | WS_TABSTOP | WS_VISIBLE | BS_DEFPUSHBUTTON,
00069                         CRect(188, 62, 258, 85), this, IDOK))
00070         {
00071                 return 0;
00072         }
00073 
00074         if (!m_ctlCancel.Create(_T("Cancel"), WS_CHILD | WS_TABSTOP | WS_VISIBLE | BS_PUSHBUTTON,
00075                         CRect(265, 62, 335, 85), this, IDCANCEL))
00076         {
00077                 return 0;
00078         }
00079 
00080         DWORD dwEditStyles = WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | WS_TABSTOP | ES_LEFT | ES_AUTOHSCROLL;
00081         if (bPassword)
00082                 dwEditStyles |= ES_PASSWORD;
00083 
00084         if (!m_ctlEdit.CreateEx(WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE, _T("EDIT"), pszDefault, dwEditStyles, CRect(6,36,335,57), this, IDC_EDITCTL))
00085                 return 0;
00086 
00087         m_Font.CreatePointFont(80, "MS Sans Serif");
00088 
00089         m_ctlLabel.SetFont(&m_Font, false);
00090         m_ctlOK.SetFont(&m_Font, false);
00091         m_ctlCancel.SetFont(&m_Font, false);
00092         m_ctlEdit.SetFont(&m_Font, false);
00093 
00094         ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00095 
00096         //RedrawWindow(NULL, NULL, RDW_UPDATENOW | RDW_ERASE | RDW_FRAME | RDW_INVALIDATE);
00097 
00098         return DoModal(pParent);
00099 }

00101 BOOL CTextEntryDlg::OnEraseBkgnd(CDC* pDC) 
00102 {
00103         CBrush brBkgd(::GetSysColor(COLOR_BTNFACE));
00104         CRect rcFillArea;
00105 
00106         pDC->GetClipBox(&rcFillArea);
00107         pDC->FillRect(&rcFillArea, &brBkgd);
00108         
00109         return true;
00110         // return CWnd::OnEraseBkgnd(pDC); // not calling base class, which would make the 
00111                                                                            // the background
00112 }

00114 int CTextEntryDlg::DoModal(CWnd *pParent)
00115 {
00116         pParent->EnableWindow(false);
00117         EnableWindow(true);
00118 
00119         // enter modal loop
00120         DWORD dwFlags = MLF_SHOWONIDLE;
00121         if (GetStyle() & DS_NOIDLEMSG)
00122                 dwFlags |= MLF_NOIDLEMSG;
00123 
00124         m_ctlEdit.SetFocus();
00125         
00126         // should the OK button be enabled or disabled?
00127         CString str;
00128         m_ctlEdit.GetWindowText(str);
00129         m_ctlOK.EnableWindow(str != "");
00130 
00131         int nReturn = RunModalLoop(MLF_NOIDLEMSG);
00132 
00133         if (m_hWnd != NULL)
00134                 SetWindowPos(NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_HIDEWINDOW|
00135                         SWP_NOSIZE|SWP_NOMOVE|SWP_NOACTIVATE|SWP_NOZORDER);
00136 
00137         pParent->SetFocus();
00138         if (GetParent() != NULL && ::GetActiveWindow() == m_hWnd)
00139                 ::SetActiveWindow(pParent->m_hWnd);
00140 
00141         if (::IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00142                 DestroyWindow();
00143 
00144         pParent->EnableWindow(true);
00145 
00146         return nReturn;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void CTextEntryDlg::OnEditboxChanged()
00150 {
00151         CString str;
00152         m_ctlEdit.GetWindowText(str);
00153         m_ctlOK.EnableWindow(str != "");
00154 }
00155 
00156 void CTextEntryDlg::OnClose() 
00157 {
00158         m_ctlEdit.GetWindowText(m_strText);
00159         EndModalLoop(IDCANCEL);
00160 }
00161 
00162 void CTextEntryDlg::OnOK()
00163 {
00164         m_ctlEdit.GetWindowText(m_strText);
00165         EndModalLoop(IDOK);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void CTextEntryDlg::OnCancel()
00169 {
00170         m_ctlEdit.GetWindowText(m_strText);
00171         EndModalLoop(IDCANCEL);
00172 }

00174 BOOL CTextEntryDlg::PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg) 
00175 {
00176         // for modeless processing (or modal)
00177         ASSERT(m_hWnd != NULL);
00178 
00179         // allow tooltip messages to be filtered
00180         if (CWnd::PreTranslateMessage(pMsg))
00181                 return TRUE;
00182 
00183         // don't translate dialog messages when in Shift+F1 help mode
00184         CFrameWnd* pFrameWnd = GetTopLevelFrame();
00185         if (pFrameWnd != NULL && pFrameWnd->m_bHelpMode)
00186                 return FALSE;
00187 
00188         // fix around for VK_ESCAPE in a multiline Edit that is on a Dialog
00189         // that doesn't have a cancel or the cancel is disabled.
00190         if (pMsg->message == WM_KEYDOWN &&
00191                 (pMsg->wParam == VK_ESCAPE || pMsg->wParam == VK_CANCEL) &&
00192                 (::GetWindowLong(pMsg->hwnd, GWL_STYLE) & ES_MULTILINE))
00193         {
00194                 HWND hItem = ::GetDlgItem(m_hWnd, IDCANCEL);
00195                 EndModalLoop(IDCANCEL);
00196                 return TRUE;
00197         }
00198         // filter both messages to dialog and from children
00199         return PreTranslateInput(pMsg);
00200         
00201         return CWnd::PreTranslateMessage(pMsg);
00202 }
00203 
00204 LPCTSTR CTextEntryDlg::GetText()
00205 {
00206         return (LPCTSTR)m_strText;
00207 }
